name: Microsoft Word XML Document
summary: Learn about .DOCXML files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Word no longer supports the DOCXML format. Instead, Word allows you to save documents as .XML files, which are more widely supported.
To save a document as an XML file with Word 365, select File â†’ Save As, then choose the "Word XML Document (*.xml)" or "Word 2003 XML Document (*.xml)" option from the dropdown menu.

description: A DOCXML file is a document created by Microsoft Word, a common word processing application. It stores the document in a raw XML format, but differs from the .DOCX format, which stores Open XML Word documents as Zip archives.

instructions: Unfortunately, there are no known applications that fully support the DOCXML format since Microsoft Word dropped support for it.
